criterion: Provides detailed steps for performing a breast self-exam, including tips on comfort, lighting, and varying pressure.
Does not provide any information about the importance of breast self-exams or their recommended frequency.
Mistakenly advises performing breast self-exams during a specific time of the month.
Correctly advises performing breast self-exams regardless of the time of the month.
Asks the user if they would like more details on the best techniques or positions, showing awareness of potential uncertainty.
Does not provide any additional information or clarification, showing a lack of awareness of potential uncertainty.
Uses natural language and correct interpretation in its response, making it easy to understand.
Uses overly technical or professional language, making it difficult for a non-expert to understand.
Provides clear instructions for performing a breast self-exam, following the recommended steps.
Does not provide clear instructions for performing a breast self-exam, failing to follow the recommended steps.
